articles.title: Asia-Pacific partnership creates new 'centre of gravity' for global trade - UNCTAD
articles.description:
A new Asia-Pacific free trade agreement set to enter into force on 1 January 2022 will create the world’s largest trading bloc by economic size, according to an UNCTAD study published on 15 December.

The Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) inc…

articles.title: 'Please desist for your safety': NYP student does Helikopter spin on escalator for TikTok - AsiaOne
articles.description: A video of a Nanyang Polytechnic (NYP) student having a bit of fun on top of a moving escalator has gone viral on TikTok — to the point that his institution has noticed this six-second clip. NYP wasn't pleased with what they saw and left a few firm replies in…
articles.content:
A video of a Nanyang Polytechnic (NYP) student having a bit of fun on top of a moving escalator has gone viral on TikTok  to the point that his institution has noticed this six-second clip.

articles.title: New species of bacteria named after Singapore - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): An unexpected discovery by a team of doctors analysing skin and wound samples has led to a new species of bacteria being identified and named after Singapore.
articles.content: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): An unexpected discovery by a team of doctors analysing skin and wound samples has led to a new species of bacteria being identified and named after Si… [+2501 chars]
